rotate_switch.description: Rotate the switch for water flow.

press_switch.description: Press the switch for a specific purpose.

wipe_and_press_switch.description: Wipe the switch clean before pressing it.

rotate_press_and_wipe_switch.description: Rotate the switch, then press it and finally wipe it clean.

press_rotate_and_wipe_switch.description: First press the switch, then rotate it and lastly wipe it clean.

rotate_switch_to_stop_water_flow.description: Rotate the switch to stop the water flow from the faucet.

rotate_and_press_switch.description: Rotate and press the switch as part of a specific maintenance routine.

press_and_rotate_switch.description: Different from rotating then pressing, this task requires pressing the switch first then rotating it.

rotate_to_increase_water_flow.description: Rotate the switch to increase water flow from the faucet.

rotate_to_decrease_water_flow.description: Rotate the switch to decrease water flow from the faucet.

wipe_and_rotate_switch.description: Wipe the switch clean, then rotate it to adjust the water flow. This is part of regular faucet maintenance.

turn_off_faucet.description: Turn off the faucet by manipulating the switch.

clean_switch_for_maintenance.description: Clean the switch to maintain its appearance and functionality.

clean_switch.description: Clean the switch to ensure proper functioning.

wipe_base_for_maintenance.description: Wipe the faucet base as a regular maintenance task.

press_base.description: Press the base of the faucet for an unusual request.

wipe_base_for_cleanliness.description: Wipe the faucet base to keep it clean and shiny.

press_and_wipe_base.description: Press and wipe the base of the faucet as part of an unusual and specific maintenance routine.

clean_base.description: Clean the faucet base for regular maintenance.

clean_faucet_base.description: Clean the faucet base to keep it hygienic and gleaming.

maintain_faucet.description: Press and rotate the switch, and wipe the entire faucet for maintenance.

clean_whole_faucet.description: Clean the entire faucet, including the switch and base.

full_maintenance.description: Full maintenance of the faucet: press switch, rotate switch, wipe switch and faucet base.

maintain_and_test_faucet.description: Press the switch, rotate it, and wipe the whole faucet for maintenance and functionality test.

clean_whole_faucet_for_maintenance.description: Clean the entire faucet by wiping the base and switch for regular maintenance.

test_faucet_by_rotate.description: Test the faucet functionality by rotating the switch back and forth.

clean_and_check_faucet.description: This involves cleaning the switch and the base, then rotating the switch to check the functionality of the faucet.

perform_extensive_maintenance.description: In this task, the switch is wiped and rotated, and the base is wiped, for a thorough cleaning and inspection of the faucet.

wipe_entire_faucet_base_and_switch.description: Wipe down the entire faucet base and switch for a clean surface.

test_faucet_functionality.description: Test the functionality of the faucet by turning it on and off.

full_faucet_maintenance.description: Perform full maintenance of the faucet by cleaning all parts and testing the switch.

clean_faucet_base.description: Clean the faucet base to maintain its appearance.

operate_faucet.description: Operate the faucet by adjusting the water flow using the switch.
